definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: counsellor, minister (Pers. loan-word; orig. form and mng. dub., cf. Andr:M 60* Mey:Entst. J. 23 Dr:Da 3:24);—pl. emph. [[הַדָּֽבְרַיׇּא]] Da 6:8; cstr. [[הַדָּֽבְרֵי]] Da 3:27; sf. [[הַדָּֽבְרַי]] Da 4:33, [[ר֫וֹהִי]]- Da 3:24.—Vid. [[גְּדָֽבְרַיׇּא]]. p. 1086
